ygData.subject: Why Heritrix2 uses old jericho html parser libaries?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, are there some reasons heritrix uses the 2.3 version of jerico html parser instead of the current 2.5 version? Version 2.5 is available in maven repository

Subject: Why Heritrix2 uses old jericho html parser libaries?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=334763322; y=je1oJbe3B36ijQCDnz6Y8DIGLSsvmcQwmbv9giHm8H1lTw
X-Yahoo-Profile: chuk_ol

Hi,

are there some reasons heritrix uses the 2.3 version of jerico html
parser instead of the current 2.5 version? Version 2.5 is available in
maven repository so switching to version 2.5 should be no problem.

Note:
Since Version 2.3 Jericho HTML uses a new Maven Group Id.
(net.htmlparser.jericho instead of net.htmlparser)
So dependency has to be changed to this:

<dependency>
    <groupId>net.htmlparser.jericho</groupId>
    <artifactId>jericho-html</artifactId>
    <version>2.5</version>
</dependency>

Christian
